original_text: The sea will pour over it. Many waves of water will cover it. The sea will pour over it. Many waves of water will cover it. The sea will pour over it. Many waves of water will cover it. The sea will pour over it. Many waves of water will cover it. The sea will pour over it.
korean_text: 바다가 바벨론에 넘침이여 그 노도 소리가 그 땅을 뒤덮었도다
